Server.Name: Craftworx
Server.Description: Craftworx features many changes in gameplay from vanilla 7 Days to Die, which up until now haven’t been as obvious to the players as I’d thought when I started making it. Clearly, this situation needs to change, which is why I’ve created this guide to the mod. Hopefully this will clear up many of the misconceptions and misunderstandings that exist.
